Reviews.Title: "Huge accessories package" is CHEAP TRASH!
Reviews.Author: S. E. Kirk "DragonMaster"
Reviews.Content: I received my order a couple weeks ago and was happy at the time because it came in only 11 days from the time I ordered it instead of the estimated month to a month and a half.  I then gave a 5 star review regarding my order and as requested by your company in order to receive a free gift.  I am very happy with the camera and the two Nikon lenses but the rest of it leaves much to be desired.  Upon closer inspection of my order afterwords I came to realize that it was missing an item that was supposed to be part of the package, to be specific, the mono pod did not come with the delivery.  Also, I was not aware as it was not made clear that the Huge Accessories Package consisted of all Zeicos products which I have found to be very cheap and of very poor quality.  The camera bag began falling apart two days after I got it and felt very cheap to begin with.  I hadn't even taken it anywhere yet, all I had done was put the camera and lenses in it.  I have since ordered a much better and higher quality bag from another company.  The 2X Telephoto is worthless because it distorts any pictures so badly.  The tripod is very flimsy and is very dificult to set the camera in whatever position desired.  The tabletop tripod is so small I wouldn't even trust my small point and shoot camera on it.  Perhaps in order to prevent some customer dissattisfaction in the future you should specify in your product descriptions what brand the items are so that your customers and make informed decissions about their purchases.  You may also want to include better quality products in your packages instead of products that are so poorly made that they are useless to begin with or fall apart in a couple of days.  Had I known at the time I gave my review I would have given a 2 star and only that high because I love the camera and Nikon lenses.  I will most likely not be doing business with Sunset Electronics again and I will recomend the same to my friends and family and anyone else who asks as well.  Putting trash products in your packages to make it look like a great deal is no way to do business and is certainly no way to keep your customers happy and purchasing from you instead of someone else.  FYI, I still haven't received the promised free gift for my 5 star review that I gave at least 3 weeks ago.  I don't really care if I get it because I am sure it is probably another peice of cheaply made trash.  I hope you actually read this and change how you conduct your business so that others don't get screwed the way you screwed me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but junky other stuff
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Pacetti
Reviews.Content: First, the camera and lenses are excellent and I couldn't be happier with them.Regarding the other package contents: I wanted to have a back-up battery, monopod, back-up memory card, and flash, so I went with this package.  I expected the accessories to be of low quality and I was right.  It probably would have been best if I had simply bought the 3-4 accessories I wanted separately so they would have been better made.  The monopod, batteries, and memory card were fine.  However, the flash is a complete waste as it can't be synched to the camera so any pictures utilizing it come out well over-exposed.  The wide angle and other lense I will probably never use (not to be confused with the 55mm and 200mm Nikon lenses, which are fantastic).I would suggest this camera and lenses to anyone considering them.  However, skip this package deal of junky accessories.  I'm not a super camera guy and even I thought they were pretty lame.

Reviews.Title: Parts might not be original
Reviews.Author: Joshmybench
Reviews.Content: the battery used in this as told by a professional nikon spare parts retail shopkeeper are not original. I had to give the camera for a cleaning as the shutter kept closing every now and then.The tripod included in the kit is trash and doesnt hold good for even a week. The rest of the kit seams ok but not of the best of best quality. I given this as a gift to my sister and it was not worthy. I suggest you buy from original Nikon showroom as the kit is not of much quality.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Nikon D90 package
Reviews.Author: Geri Lopker "continuous learner"
Reviews.Content: This package is a dream. For about the cost of the D90 and one lens at my local retailer, this package is everything someone needs to get started or take their photography to the next level. The company was great to work with. A package was well-packed, and the items as promised. There were a couple little things missing, which the company shipped that same day. I am very happy with the package and the retailer.

Reviews.Title: Junk is right, Trash From Sunset Electronics
Reviews.Author: HotRod
Reviews.Content: Yes your right, great camera but I purchased the 2x high Definition Crap Filter, and wide angle filter. Like everyone else, I am looking for a nikon camera, but not from Sunset Electronics Crap Cameras. I am looking at best buys, i will spend a little more but at least i know what I'm getting.

Reviews.Title: No time flat!
Reviews.Author: cherrystandphoto
Reviews.Content: My order came in no time flat! I didn't have time to pace the floors waiting for it to show up. I love my new camera and I still haven't finished playing with all of the extra accessories- there are so many! I'm grateful to have found such a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera, greate Photos and Accessories
Reviews.Author: Vicky
Reviews.Content: Its a greate deal to get D90 with all Accessories and Nice Photos withNikon D90 SLR Digital Camera with 18-55mm VR Lens and 55-200mm VR Lens + Huge Accessories Package Including Wide Angle Macro Lens + 2x Telephoto + 3 Pc Filter KIT + 8gb Sdhc Memory Card + 2x Extended Life Batteries + Carrying Case + Tripod + Monopod

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC PACKAGE/BARGAIN
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Cacioppo
Reviews.Content: I wanted a GOOD camera - I didnt need a professional grade camera, but I wanted a digital SLR, more than just a little point and shoot.  One of my best friends who IS A PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHER recommended the D90.Of course I IMMEDIATELY went to AMAZON.COM because I know I would find the best value there.  NEVER expected, however, to get the pheonomonal package I got.  It has EVERYTHING you need to get out and take a "PULITZER PRIZE WINNING" photo!!!  Thanks - I am a very satisfied customer!!!

Reviews.Title: Changed the way I take photos
Reviews.Author: Jane Quigley
Reviews.Content: I've wanted a D90 for a while and this was too good of a deal to pass up. This is an incredible camera that, while it's easy to start taking great photos, is also challenging (in a good way).Have already signed up for classes at the Nikon School so I can get everything I can from this camera. I love it and this bundle has a lot of great things. Fun kit.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera.
Reviews.Author: average purchaser
Reviews.Content: The camera is a great item.  5 star for the camera.The kit said it had a aluminum case.  They ran out of them and could not them.  The seller offered to give me several memory cards instead.  I took them since I was going to buy a different camera bag.  4 star.I did not receive the warranty cards with this camera and lenses.  The seller told me that they keep them for service.  Why would they do this.  1 star.Yes the Lenses are standard items, but the 18-55mm started to not focus properly with in the warranty period.  Tried to have fixed though the Nikon service center.  They told me it would cost over $100 dollars.  I told them it was under warranty and they said maybe so but I did not have the original warranty card.  So I had to resend lens to the seller.  They looked at it and then sent it to the same place for repair that I originally sent it to along with the original warranty card which they kept on file.  I needed the lens back for a event that week and the seller told me they would just send me a new lens. Received the lens the day before I needed it.  Close call.Have been using the equipment for over 4 years now and it still works great.

Reviews.Title: Love This Product
Reviews.Author: Loretta Grogan
Reviews.Content: I have been in search for a Nikon D90!  I happen to come across this seller that had the whole package!  Camera, lenses, zoom lens, tripods, batteries, memory stick, etc., etc., etc.  I am sooo happy with this purchase.  Couldn't believe the amount of stuff you get with this package compared to spending the same amount of money on a Nikon D90 by itself.  Great purchase.  Very happy.  Delivery right on time.  Thank you!

Reviews.Title: sunset electronics
Reviews.Author: Big greek
Reviews.Content: one of the most helpful customer service departments i have dealt with. I WILL USE THEM OFTEN IN THE FUTURE.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Emma
Reviews.Content: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS CAMERA!  All the gadgets that come with it are a bonus too!  the only thing i had a problem with was they never sent me a tripod  and the camera bag was worn out within 3 months.  but everything else is great

Reviews.Title: wonderful camera package
Reviews.Author: richbasm
Reviews.Content: Camera is great, pictures are clear and beautiful.  All the rest of the package is great except the tripods. Large tripod broke very quickly and small tripod is too small for camera this size. Still, well worth the price for everything that is included!

Reviews.Title: ok but not as good as it looked
Reviews.Author: recently bought
Reviews.Content: We have not been able to use them to much yet. From initial impressions, the camera and lens'are nice, but the other products were not as nice as the were described or as they appeared. The batteries are nice to have and the more we use it the better deal we may feel we received.

ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D90 SLR Digital Camera with 18-55mm VR Lens and 55-200mm VR Lens + Huge Battery, Lens & Tripod Complete Accessories Package (Everything you Need)
